short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate secure passwords with customizable options.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate strong and secure passwords with customizable options. The Password Generator Chrome extension allows you to select from lowercase letters, uppercase letters, numbers, and custom special characters to create passwords of any length. It also remembers your settings and preferences, offering you a seamless and secure experience every time. This extension works entirely offline and does not collect or store any of your personal data.
